<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Wellspring Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=3030) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 249 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wellspring Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=104)

**Prerequisites**
[Wellspring Mage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3029)

</column>

---

When you generate a wellspring surge, roll twice on the [Wellspring Surges Table](/Rules.aspx?ID=1580) and take the result of your choice. This doesn't apply when you cause another creature to generate a wellspring surge.
